title: SlaValidation
description: SLA validation details for data contract.

refreshFrequencyMet.description: Whether refresh frequency requirement was met.

freshnessCheckTimesMet.description: Whether all scheduled freshness check times had data refreshed within the allowed latency window.

freshnessCheckTimesResults.description: Per-timestamp results for each configured freshness check time.

scheduledTime.description: The expected refresh time in HH:mm format.

met.description: Whether data was refreshed within the allowed latency window of this scheduled time.

actualRefreshTime.description: The actual data refresh timestamp detected (Unix epoch millis), if any.
